title: Memories of Rock
description: In a world that has bridged the realms of gods and mortals to throw forth a feast for ruthless demons and ambitious civilizations, there is always a score to settle. And Bessem has one of her own. She is an unblooded with a desire for vengeance at those responsible for the slaughter of her family. However, as she would come to learn, the truth is only what you believe it to be. While Bessem sharpens her spear and prepares for the thrust, she would stumble upon a mark far greater than she bargained for. The hidden players of a deadly game have made their move. Now, in the midst of perilous politicking and the gathering clouds of a battle, she must make hers. The Pantheon is the price.
author: Palle E.K. Oswald
